%% === Aktor ===
subgraph LeftSide[ ]
direction TB
Admin(["ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’¼ Admin\nLembaga"])
Tutor(["ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ« Tentor\n(Guru Les)"])

subgraph RightSide[ ]
direction TB
Parent(["ğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ‘§ Wali Siswa"])

%% === Sistem ===
subgraph System["ğŸ“˜ Sistem Rapot Digital Zidnan Course"]
direction TB

%% --- Admin ---
A1["Kelola Data Master"]
A2["Penempatan Guru & Siswa"]
A3["Monitoring Data Akademik"]
A4["Review & Approve Rapot Bulanan\n(include: Generate PDF)"]
A5["Distribusi Laporan & Tagihan"]

%% --- Tentor ---
T1["Manajemen Pertemuan & Absensi"]
T2["Isi Laporan Harian"]
T3["Isi Evaluasi Bulanan\n(include: Ajukan Rapot)\n(extend: Revisi Rapot)"]

%% --- Wali Siswa ---
W1["Akses Laporan & Riwayat Belajar"]
W2["Notifikasi & Pembayaran\n(extend: Konfirmasi Pembayaran)"]

end

%% === Relasi Aktor ===
Admin --> A1
Admin --> A2
Admin --> A3
Admin --> A4
Admin --> A5

Tutor --> T1
Tutor --> T2
Tutor --> T3

Parent --> W1
Parent --> W2

%% === Relasi antar Use Case (Include & Extend) ===
A2 --> A1:::include
A4 --> A3:::include
A5 --> A4:::include
A5 -.-> W2:::extend

T2 --> T1:::include
T3 --> T2:::include
T3 --> A3:::include
T3 -.-> |"Jika laporan ditolak"| A4:::extend

W2 -.-> |"Jika belum bayar,\nrapot tidak dikirim via WA,\nnamun bisa dilihat di web"| W1:::extend

%% === Style ===
classDef include stroke:#7a73ff,stroke-width:2px,stroke-dasharray:5 5;
classDef extend stroke:#d42acc,stroke-width:2px,stroke-dasharray:5 5;
